question: I'm a 49 year old with diabetes and cirrhosis.Nausea and vomitting have been a part of my daily life for a long time .Recently when I start to vomit it 's like something locks down. Nothing comes up but itdoesn't stay down either.This is more than dry heaves but not actually vomitting.I hate to vomit but this is worse, it happens several times per day rather I eat or not.I really don't think it's related to my liver hope not any way) but lean more toward my stomach.does any one have a idea.Gail
title: Vomitting
